Package pacman.game.helpers

Package containing all the body factories, main game settings, materials and other helping functions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    B2DBodyFactory
    Class that builds bodies with the desired types.
    B2DLocation
    Class that returns or sets the positions and orientation of entities.
    B2DSteering
    Class that controls the turn angles of the entities.
    BodyEditorLoader
    Loads the collision fixtures defined with the Physics Body Editor application.
    BodyEditorLoader.CircleModel
    Class for creating a circular body.
    BodyEditorLoader.Model
    Class for creating a body.
    BodyEditorLoader.PolygonModel
    Class for creating a polygonal body.
    BodyEditorLoader.RigidBodyModel
    Class for creating a rigid body.
    GameAssetManager
    Class that helps control different game assets like audio and textures.
    GameSettings
    Class that hold the main game settings such as animation speed, scaling and movement speed of the entities.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameScreens
    Listing of the available game screens.
    MaterialTypes
    List of the available materials to build bodies.

Package pacman.game.helpers Description

Package containing all the body factories, main game settings, materials and other helping functions.
